entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
